1410470.name: Sauna2000
1410470.description:
Sauna2000: Comedic Sauna Simulator Mystery Horror Game


COMING SOON TO EARLY ACCESS!


This is your once-in-a-lifetime possibility to heat a Finnish sauna without actually going to Finland. A simple midsummer plan to heat your sauna and enjoy a cold beer just got a little more complicated! You've crashed your car into a moose, and worse, someone has robbed your summer cottage clean. You'll have to find a way to regain your peace of mind - and while you're at it, help your cottage neighbours have a nice midsummer festival.

MuhvijÃ¤rvi is a small laketown in the heart of Finland. In Sauna2000 youÂ´ll get to experience Finnish lifestyle of a small rural peninsula community in the summer of Y2K.






A handcrafted world with over 10 voice-acted and written characters! Get to know them, and even ask them to join you when the sauna is hot!
Many different endings depending on the choices you make. Optional investigative horror narrative. Will you make it over the weekend?

Chop some wood, heat the bathing water, and as the sauna heats discover the true meaning of relaxation.
CLASSIC SUMMERFEST ACTIVITIES: Enjoy sausages and cold drinks at the pier while you enjoy the peaceful setting of beautiful Finnish nature. Shoot things with a BB gun, throw some darts, catch some fish, take cool polaroid photos, or take part in a traditional Finnish boot-throwing competition. You can also move around with your boat if you donâ€™t happen to be out of gas!
PS1 ERA INSPIRED GRAPHICS AND UNIQUE SETTING: Highly stylized world made with passion to video games of older generation. Experience land of the thousand lakes, as you roam the Finnish countryside.

KEY FEATURES COMING SOON IN EA:

  • FULL VR SUPPORT: Experience MuhvijÃ¤rvi from your perspective.
  • EXPANDED WORLD: Over 30 voice-acted and written characters + Dance Hall + Visiting tourists + Rideable bicycles + Karaoke gameplay + Orienteering competition + Fishing competition
  • AND MORE: Free seasonal content expansions planned for the future (more about them in later the updates ğŸ˜Š).
